name: MazeTower
description:
Find the way to the top floor. Get crystals. Discover new mazes. Skip the most confusing. An infinite number of mazes. 

Controls: WASD / Arrows / Mouse / Touch

Features of current version:
• each level contains 24 maze
• there are no dead-end labyrinths, but there are tangled
• mazes vary in difficulty and are represented by green, blue and red banners
• more challenging levels with high towers are marked with gold bezel
• bonus is given for completing each maze, as well as an additional bonus for completing all 24 mazes of current level
• for repeated passage of the maze is given only half the bonus 
• for crystals you can open locked maze
• the most difficult mazes you can pass for crystals
• a list of 24 mazes you can always upgrade to a new
